categories: Category:Cut content from Light and Shadow

nodes.text: Lady of Light was the Jedi Lian Dray's starship. He used it to transport him to the planet Vigil where it stayed for a long time before he met with the Force-sensitive young girl Nova. He then used it to transport both himself and Nova to Ossus both so that she could be trained as a Jedi and so that he could face his past.
